name: Hill Monster Truck:Stunt Racing
description:
It is a new challenge racing game, now available on app store.
Try to drive the monster truck as best as you can.Ride in different themes and beautiful backgrounds.
Collect all the golden coins and have real driving feeling.Buy to unlock new monster cars and upgrade them in the store.
Control your Monster vehicles to complete some hot Flips and new stunts while riding.Real cool!
